data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Azarkina, Galina N., Esyunin, Sergei L., Kuz'Min, Evgeniy A., Marusik, Yuri M. (2016): On the synonymy of two wolf spider species of the genus Alopecosa (Araneae, Lycosidae) from the steppe zone of Russia. Zootaxa 4205 (4): 339-348, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.4.2|4 occurrences
